column1: 2.2 Topic detection LDA CITATION is a generative probabilistic model where documents are viewed as mixtures over underlying topics
column2: and each topic is a distribution over words

column1: 2 Tools 2.1 Named entity recognition The Stanford named entity recognition (NER) software1 CITATION is an implementation of linear chain Conditional Random Field (CRF) sequence models
column4: location and other) named entity recognizer for English
